Wed, 01 May 2024 22:03:50 +0000 Te Huia passenger train service between Waikato / Hamilton and Auckland launching 06 April 2021 picture supplied credit: Te Huia FREE FOR EDITROIAL USE NZH 11Feb21 - Photo / Te Huia NZH 11Feb21 - Photo / Te Huia BTG 10Sep21 - The Te Huia passenger train service between Hamilton and Auckland is unable to operate because of border restrictions. Photo / Te Huia BTG 13Aug22 - The Te Huia service between Auckland and Hamilton is one of New Zealand's few inter-regional passenger trains that are not for tourists. PHOTO / TE HUIA BTG 20Jan23 - A plan to enable the return of passenger rail to the Bay of Plenty is in the works. Photo / Te Huia BTG 04May23 - Te Huia passenger train service between Waikato/Hamilton and Auckland launched in April 2021.Photo / supplied BTG 29Jun23 - Te Huia is part of the Community Connect initiative.
